name: Wheater of the Colossus
description:
Wheater of the Colossus

This game is an entry for LD52, Compo format (48h)
This game took some inspiration from Shadow of the Colossus (hence the name !)

/!\ Attention /!\ : The windows executable version is recommended to get a better experience as the WebGL version may be a bit laggy !

Goals :
  • Harvest Wheats in order to defeat the Colossus !
  • Climb on the Colossus with harvested Wheat.
  • Break the 3 Hearts of the Colossus in order to win !
Commands :
  • Move : WASD / Arrow keys
  • Rotate Camera : Move Mouse (Sensitivity can be modified in Option)
  • Attack/Harvest : Left Mouse Click
  • Jump : Space
  • Pause/Option : Escape
Credits :
  • Knowk (Developper)
Comments :

I struggled a lot on how to climb on the Colossus. Therefore, I barely had time to do more than the main feature. So the game is more of a prototype testing a feature than a proper game haha. Nonetheless I believe it is still pretty fun to climb on him !
